chapters.title: Chapter 35: Sharp LessonsChapter 36: Misdirections
chapters.info: Dorindha, p. 587 (529)—A Maiden of the Spear with red hair; she is about Egwene's age. She gives Mat a smile on his way by—she was one of the ones who convinced him to play a game of Maidens' Kiss. She has red hair. Note: there are two Aiel women named Dorindha; this one is a Maiden of the Spear, and the other is the wife of Bael, clan chief of the Goshien Aiel. Do not confuse them.
